scripts.css-compile: node-sass --include-path node_modules/swiper/dist/css --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss --output-style expanded  --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/template.scss ../public/css/template.css
scripts.js-concat: concat -o ../public/js/template.js node_modules/toastr/toastr.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/util.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/collapse.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/dropdown.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/tooltip.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/popover.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/modal.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/tab.js  node_modules/swiper/dist/js/swiper.js js/custom.js
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --ignore scss/ --ignore js/fa-build.js --ignore js/template.js -e js -x "npm run js"
